TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlUrlResolver extends System.Xml.XmlResolver

summary.span: 解析由统一资源标识符 (URI) 命名的外部 XML 资源。

span.span: Resolves external XML resources named by a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于解析外部 XML 资源，如实体、 文档类型定义 (Dtd) 或架构。 is used to resolve external XML resources such as entities, document type definitions (DTDs) or schemas. 它也是用于过程包含和导入在可扩展样式表语言 (XSL) 样式表或 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构中找到的元素。It is also used to process include and import elements found in Extensible StyleSheet Language (XSL) style sheets or XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas. 是中的所有类的默认冲突解决程序命名空间。 is the default resolver for all classes in the namespace. 它支持 `file://` 和 `http://` 协议以及来自 类的请求。It supports the `file://` and `http://` protocols and requests from the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 对象可以包含敏感信息，例如用户凭据。 objects can contain sensitive information such as user credentials. 你应谨慎你缓存对象，并且不应将传递到不受信任的组件的对象。You should be careful when you cache objects and should not pass objects to an untrusted component. ## 解析 DtdResolving DTDs 如果 XML 读取器 () 包含外部 DTD 的 XML 文件中进行读取时，它调用方法以获取流表示的 DTD。If an XML reader () is reading an XML file that contains an external DTD, it calls the method to get a stream representation of the DTD. 如果 DTD 的 URI 是相对的 URI，XML 读取器会调用方法并返回一个绝对 URI 的给定`relativeUri`和`baseURi`参数。If the URI of the DTD is a relative URI, the XML reader calls the method and returns an absolute URI for the given `relativeUri` and `baseURi` parameters. 如果不知道如何解析的 URI，它将返回`null`。If the doesn't know how to resolve the URI, it returns `null`. 方法使用 属性中的适当信息以访问资源。The method uses the information in the property as appropriate to gain access to the resource. 出于安全考虑，没有针对此属性的 `get` 访问器。There is no `get` accessor to this property for security reasons. 在重写， **GetEntity**是利用中的凭据信息的方法**凭据**属性。When overwriting , **GetEntity** is the method that utilizes the credential information in the **Credentials** property. 解析所有其他 XML 资源与解析 DTD 非常类似。Resolving all other XML resources is very similar to resolving DTDs. 协商与外部资源的连接并返回内容的表示形式。 negotiates the connection with the external resource and returns a representation of the content. 正在调用的对象解释流。The object that is making the call to interprets the stream. ## 扩展 XmlUrlResolver 类Extending the XmlUrlResolver class 类的默认行为是从其源而不是缓存中解析 XML 数据资源。The default behavior of the class is to resolve an XML data resource from its source, not from cache. 在某些情况下，从缓存解析数据资源可以节省到数据资源的行程，因而可提高应用程序的性能。In some cases, resolving a data resource from cache can improve the performance of an application by saving a trip to the data resource's server. 这种性能增益必须针对最新内容需要加以权衡。The performance gains here must be weighed against the need for up-to-date content. 以下示例扩展并生成一个新的类， `XmlCachingResolver`，若要从缓存中检索资源。The following example extends and builds a new class, `XmlCachingResolver`, to retrieve resources from the cache. 这是通过重写 属性和 方法来完成的。This is done by overriding the property and the method. [!code-csharp[XmlCachingResolver_ex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlCachingResolver_ex/CS/XmlCachingResolver_ex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlCachingResolver_ex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlCachingResolver_ex/VB/XmlCachingResolver_ex.vb#1)] `XmlCachingResolver` 类的缓存行为在 `GetEntity` 方法中实现。The caching behavior of the `XmlCachingResolver` class is implemented in the `GetEntity` method. 这是通过创建新的 和 对象来完成的。This is done by creating new and objects. 对象是使用 枚举的 成员创建的。The object is created using the member of the enumeration. 使用 对象设置 对象的 属性。The property of the object is set with the object. 使用 `XmlCachingResolver` `Boolean` 创建 `enableHttpCaching` 类的一个实例。An instance of the `XmlCachingResolver` class is created with the `Boolean` `enableHttpCaching`. 当此值设置为`true`，实例尽可能解析默认缓存中的资源。When this value is set to `true`, the instance resolves a resource from the default cache if possible. 当`enableHttpCaching`设置为`false`，该实例使用的默认行为和解析从其源的资源。When `enableHttpCaching` is set to `false`, the instance uses the default behavior and resolves resources from their source. > [!NOTE] > 此示例利用.NET Framework 中的 XML 类的扩展性。This example leverages the extensibility of the XML classes in the .NET Framework. 可以扩展和自定义其他类以满足特定应用程序的需要。Other classes can be extended and customized to suit the needs of a particular application. ## Examples 下面的示例创建使用使用默认凭据。The following example creates an that uses an with default credentials. [!code-csharp[XmlResolver_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlResolver_Samples/CS/XmlResolver_Samples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlResolver_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlResolver_Samples/VB/XmlResolver_Samples.vb#1)]

returns.span: 流对象；如果指定了流以外的类型，则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用方想要将给定的 URI 映射到包含该 URI 表示资源的对象，使用此方法。This method is used when the caller wants to map a given URI to an object that contains the resource that the URI represents. 此方法的异步版本，请参阅。For the asynchronous version of this method, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 你的应用程序可以缓解内存拒绝服务威胁到方法通过实现 IStream来限制读取的字节数。Your application can mitigate memory denial of service threats to the method by implementing IStream to limit the number of bytes read. 这有助于防止恶意代码尝试传递到的字节的无限流的情况下出现方法。This helps guard against situations where malicious code attempts to pass an infinite stream of bytes to the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示`GetEntity`和方法。The following example demonstrates the `GetEntity` and methods. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlUrlResolver.ResolveUri Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlUrlResolver.ResolveUri Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlUrlResolver.ResolveUri Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlUrlResolver.ResolveUri Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlUrlResolver.ResolveUri Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlUrlResolver.ResolveUri Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override Uri ResolveUri (Uri baseUri, string relativeUri);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Uri ResolveUri(class System.Uri baseUri, string relativeUri) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ResolveUri (baseUri As Uri, relativeUri As String) As Uri
public: override Uri ^ ResolveUri(Uri ^ baseUri, System::String ^ relativeUri);

param.name: baseUri
param.span: 用于解析相对 URI 的基 URI。

span.span: The base URI used to resolve the relative URI.

param.name: relativeUri

span.span: The URI to resolve.

param.span: URI 可以是绝对的或相对的。

span.span: The URI can be absolute or relative.

param.span: 如果是绝对的，此值将有效地替换 baseUri 值。

span.span: If absolute, this value effectively replaces the baseUri value.

param.span: 如果是相对的，它将与 baseUri 组合以构成绝对 URI。

span.span: If relative, it combines with the baseUri to make an absolute URI.

summary.span: 从基 URI 和相对 URI 解析绝对 URI。

span.span: Resolves the absolute URI from the base and relative URIs.

returns.span: 绝对 URI；如果不能解析相对 URI，则为

span.span: The absolute URI, or if the relative URI cannot be resolved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 绝对 URI 可以用作相对于此 URI 的实体的任何后续请求的基 URI。The absolute URI can be used as the base URI for any subsequent requests for entities that are relative to this URI.

span.span: is or is .
This method has an inheritance demand.
Full trust is required to override the method.
